means: [台球]推球，跟球打法（使竿击的球在击中目的球后继续滚动的打法）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"跟随，追踪"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: pursue, follow, chase, hunt, trace, track, trail
means: pursue ： 指坚持不懈、毫不动摇地紧跟、追赶某人、某物或某个事业。
follow ： 普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟随起引导作用的人或物，跟随的动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。
chase ： 指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
hunt ： 原义为"追猎、猎取"，现用于指追捕或搜寻逃犯等。
trace ： 指根据线索或足迹进行跟踪。用于抽象意义时指找到某事物的根源。
track ： 指沿着人或动物留下的印迹或行迹追踪。

word_mean: follow-up control 使被控变量随参比变量的变化而变化的闭环控制。

sentence.Network_en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentence.Network_cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

sentence.Network_en: He wants companies to follow the European model of social responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望各公司能够以欧洲公司为榜样，承担社会责任。

sentence.Network_en: He decided on roast chicken and vegetables, with apple pie to follow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他决定点烤鸡配蔬菜，然后再要一份苹果派。

lj.lj_ly: you are on the right track so follow your nose.
lj.lj_ls: 你的方向正确，可以凭直觉干。

jx.jx_en_mean: move along guided by one's sense of smell
(of a cricket team) be required to bat again immediately after failing in their first innings to reach a score within a set number of runs of the score made by their opponents
jx.jx_cn_mean: （板球）继续击球（第一局得分少的球队先击球）

jx.jx_en_mean: occur as a consequence or result of

lj.lj_ly: the announcement followed on from the collapse of the merchant bank.
lj.lj_ls: 那家商业银行倒闭后，发表了这个布告。

jx.jx_en_mean: continue an action or task to its conclusion

jx.jx_cn_mean: 紧追，对…进行进一步调查

lj.lj_ly: I decided to follow up the letters with phone calls.
lj.lj_ls: 我决定写完信之后再打电话继续追查。

jx.jx_en_mean: To move or proceed in unison or in accord with an example
jx.jx_cn_mean: 遵从，依照：协调地或遵照原例移动或操作

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Sports} To carry a stroke to natural completion after hitting or releasing a ball or other object.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【体育运动】} 随球：打球或其它物体后，进行自然完成的一击

jx.jx_en_mean: To carry an act, a project, or an intention to completion; pursue fully
jx.jx_cn_mean: 坚持到底：贯彻一个行动、项目或完成某项意图；全力追求

lj.lj_ly: followed through on her promise to reorganize the department.
lj.lj_ls: 把诺言贯彻到底，重新组建部门

jx.jx_en_mean: To carry to completion; follow through on
jx.jx_cn_mean: 把…贯彻（干）到底：完成；继续执行

lj.lj_ly: followed up their recommendations with concrete proposals.
lj.lj_ls: 运用具体的建议把计划执行到底

jx.jx_en_mean: To increase the effectiveness or enhance the success of by further action
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使更进一步，使更成功：通过进一步行动增加效果或提高成功性

lj.lj_ly: followed up her interview with a telephone call.
lj.lj_ls: 用电话进一步完成面试

jx.jx_en_mean: As will be stated next. Used to introduce a specified enumeration, explanation, or command.
jx.jx_cn_mean: （所述）：接着将作出说明。用来介绍特定的细目、解释和命令

jx.jx_en_mean: To move straight ahead or in a direct path.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 径直（而行）：直着向前移或沿笔直的路径走
【非正式用语】 由直觉指引

lj.lj_ly: had no formal training but became a success by following his nose.
lj.lj_ls: 没有经过正式的培训却凭直觉取得了成功

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Games} To play a card of the same suit as the one led.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【游戏】} 跟牌：由一个人带头，跟一张同样的牌

jx.jx_en_mean: To do as another has done; follow an example.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 模仿：做别人已经做过的事；以…为例子

means.word_mean: 追随;跟随;跟从;追赶;追逐

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English folgian, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch volgen and German folgen

encyclopedia.content: 英语单词 follow [英] [ˈfɔləu] [美] [ˈfɑlo] 过去式：followed 过去分词：followed 现在分词：following vt. & vi. 1. 跟随； 接 vt. 1. 注视， 密切注意 2. 从事， 经营 3. 遵照， 接受， 听从 4. 追逐，追赶；追踪 5. 沿着…走，顺…走，沿…而行，循（路） 6. （按时间、顺序等）接着，随后（或跟着、接着）发生，继…之后 7. 继承，接替（职务、职位等） 8. 作为…的结果而发生，

entry.def: If you follow someone who is going somewhere, you move along behind them because you want to go to the same place.

example.ex: We followed him up the steps into a large hall...
example.tran: 我们跟着他上楼来到一个很大的大厅。

example.ex: Please follow me, madam...
example.tran: 请跟我来，夫人。

entry.def: If you follow someone who is going somewhere, you move along behind them without their knowledge, in order to catch them or find out where they are going.

example.ex: She realized that the Mercedes was following her...
example.tran: 她意识到那辆奔驰在跟踪她。

example.ex: I think we're being followed.
example.tran: 我想我们被跟踪了。

entry.def: If you follow someone to a place where they have recently gone and where they are now, you go to join them there.

example.ex: He followed Janice to New York, where she was preparing an exhibition.
example.tran: 他追随贾尼丝到了纽约，她正在那里准备一个展览。

entry.def: An event, activity, or period of time that follows a particular thing happens or comes after that thing, at a later time.

example.ex: ...the rioting and looting that followed the verdict...
example.tran: 判决宣布之后发生的暴乱和抢劫

example.ex: I remember nothing else about the days following Daddy's death...
example.tran: 父亲去世之后那几天我不记得有什么其他事了。

entry.def: If you follow one thing with another, you do or say the second thing after you have done or said the first thing.

example.ex: Her first major role was in Martin Scorsese's 'Goodfellas' and she followed this with a part in Spike Lee's 'Jungle Fever'.
example.tran: 她主演的第一部影片是马丁·斯科塞斯的《好家伙》，之后接拍了斯派克·李的《丛林热》。

entry.def: If it follows that a particular thing is the case, that thing is a logical result of something else being true or being the case.

example.ex: Just because a bird does not breed one year, it does not follow that it will fail the next...
example.tran: 不能因为一只鸟某一年没有繁殖就断定它第二年也不会繁殖。

example.ex: If the explanation is right, two things follow...
example.tran: 如果解释是正确的，可以推断出两件事。

entry.tran: (文章或讲演)接下来是,后面的是，下面是
entry.def: If you refer to the words that follow or followed, you are referring to the words that come next or came next in a piece of writing or speech.

example.ex: What follows is an eyewitness account...
example.tran: 接下来的是目击者的陈述。

example.ex: There followed a list of places where Hans intended to visit...
example.tran: 下面列出的是汉斯打算游览的地点。

entry.def: If you follow a path, route, or set of signs, you go somewhere using the path, route, or signs to direct you.

example.ex: If they followed the road, they would be certain to reach a village...
example.tran: 如果他们沿着这条路走，就一定会到达一个村庄。

example.ex: All we had to do was follow the map...
example.tran: 我们所要做的就是按照地图走。

entry.def: If something such as a path or river follows a particular route or line, it goes along that route or line.

example.ex: Our route follows the Pacific coast through densely populated neighbourhoods...
example.tran: 我们的路线沿着太平洋海岸，途经人口稠密的街区。

example.ex: The Lot river follows a winding and tortuous course.
example.tran: 洛特河的河道蜿蜒曲折。

entry.tran: 注视(运动物体);(眼睛)跟随着
entry.def: If you follow something with your eyes, or if your eyes follow it, you watch it as it moves or you look along its route or course.

example.ex: Ann's eyes followed a police car as it drove slowly past.
example.tran: 安注视着一辆缓缓驶过的警车。

entry.tran: 按照…方式发展;以…方式发生
entry.def: Something that follows a particular course of development happens or develops in that way.

example.ex: His release turned out to follow the pattern set by that of the other six hostages.
example.tran: 最终他的获释方式也和其他 6名人质的获释如出一辙。

entry.tran: 接受，遵循(建议、指示等);按(菜谱)进行
entry.def: If you follow advice, an instruction, or a recipe, you act or do something in the way that it indicates.

example.ex: Take care to follow the instructions carefully...
example.tran: 注意严格按照说明进行。

example.ex: No two chefs follow the same recipe.
example.tran: 每个厨师都有不同的烹饪方式。

entry.def: If you follow what someone else has done, you do it too because you think it is a good thing or because you want to copy them.

example.ex: His admiration for the athlete did not extend to the point where he would follow his example in taking drugs...
example.tran: 他对于这个运动员的崇拜还没有达到要学他吸毒的程度。

example.ex: Where eastern Germany goes the rest will surely follow.
example.tran: 东德怎样做，其他地方一定会效仿。

entry.def: If you follow someone in what you do, you do the same thing or job as they did previously.

example.ex: He followed his father and became a surgeon...
example.tran: 他子承父业，成为了一名外科医生。

example.ex: Anni-Frid's son has followed her into the music business.
example.tran: 安妮-弗瑞德的儿子子承母业，也进入了音乐圈。

entry.tran: 理解，跟得上(解释或故事情节)
entry.def: If you are able to follow something such as an explanation or the story of a film, you understand it as it continues and develops.

example.ex: Can you follow the plot so far?...
example.tran: 目前为止剧情你能看得懂吗？

example.ex: I'm afraid I don't follow.
example.tran: 恐怕我没明白。

entry.def: If you follow something, you take an interest in it and keep informed about what happens.

example.ex: ...the millions of people who follow football because they genuinely love it...
example.tran: 数以百万计的人关注足球，因为他们发自内心地热爱足球

example.ex: She was following Laura's progress closely.
example.tran: 她密切关注着劳拉的进展。

entry.def: A story, film, or television programme that follows someone or something is about their experiences over a particular period of time.

example.ex: The film follows the fortunes of two women.
example.tran: 这部电影讲述了两个女人的命运。

entry.tran: (欣赏节目的同时)对照看(脚本或乐谱)
entry.def: If you follow a score or written copy of a play, you read it while you listen to it being performed.

example.ex: ...an annotated version of Mozart's opera that allows the listener to follow the score.
example.tran: 使听者能够一边欣赏一边对照着看的莫扎特歌剧的注释乐谱

entry.def: If you follow a particular religion or political belief, you have that religion or belief.

example.ex: 'Do you follow any particular religion?' — 'Yes, we're all Hindus.'
example.tran: “你们有自己的宗教信仰吗？”——“是的，我们都是印度教徒。”

entry.def: You use as follows in writing or speech to introduce something such as a list, description, or explanation.

example.ex: The winners are as follows: E. Walker; R. Foster; R. Gates; A. Mackintosh...
example.tran: 优胜者分别是：E.沃克、R.福斯特、R.盖茨和A.麦金托什。

example.ex: This can be done if you proceed as follows.
example.tran: 按照如下操作即可完成。

entry.def: You use followed by to say what comes after something else in a list or ordered set of things.

example.ex: Potatoes are still the most popular food, followed by white bread.
example.tran: 马铃薯仍然是最受欢迎的食物，其次是白面包。

entry.def: After mentioning one course of a meal, you can mention the next course by saying what you will have to follow or what there will be to follow .

example.ex: He decided on roast chicken and vegetables, with apple pie to follow.
example.tran: 他决定点烤鸡配蔬菜，然后是苹果派。

entry.def: If you follow through an action, plan, or idea or follow through with it, you continue doing or thinking about it until you have done everything possible.

example.ex: The leadership has been unwilling to follow through the implications of these ideas...
example.tran: 领导层不愿意对这些想法的含意进行深入探究。

example.ex: I was trained to be an actress but I didn't follow it through...
example.tran: 我接受过演员培训，但是我没有坚持下去。

entry.tran: 追查;将…深入下去;对…采取进一步行动
entry.def: If you follow up something that has been said, suggested, or discovered, you try to find out more about it or take action about it.

example.ex: State security police are following up several leads...
example.tran: 国家安全警察正在追查几条线索。

example.ex: An officer took a statement from me, but no one's bothered to follow it up.
example.tran: 一位警官收集了我的供述，但却没有人愿意追查下去。

means.word_mean: 1. to travel behind, go after, come after;

sentences.sentence: "The ducklings followed their mother around the pond"
"Please follow the guide through the museum"

means.word_mean: 3. come as a logical consequence; follow logically;

sentences.sentence: "It follows that your assertion is false"

means.word_mean: 5. act in accordance with someone's rules, commands, or wishes;
6. come after in time, as a result;
7. behave in accordance or in agreement with;

sentences.sentence: "Mary plays best, with John and Sue following"

means.word_mean: 9. choose and follow; as of theories, ideas, policies, strategies or plans;
10. to bring something about at a later time than;

sentences.sentence: "He followed his lecture with a question and answer period"

means.word_mean: 11. imitate in behavior; take as a model;
12. follow, discover, or ascertain the course of development of something;

sentences.sentence: "We must follow closely the economic development is Cuba"

means.word_mean: 13. follow with the eyes or the mind;

sentences.sentence: "Keep an eye on the baby, please!"
"She followed the men with the binoculars"
"The orchestra could barely follow the frequent pitch changes of the soprano"
"He kept up on his country's foreign policies"

means.word_mean: 17. to be the product or result;
18. accept and follow the leadership or command or guidance of;

sentences.sentence: "These people still follow the laws of their ancient religion"

means.word_mean: 20. work in a specific place, with a specific subject, or in a specific function;

sentences.sentence: "The police had been following him for weeks but they could not prove his involvement in the bombing"

means.word_mean: 22. follow in or as if in pursuit;

sentences.sentence: "The police car pursued the suspected attacker"
"Her bad deed followed her and haunted her dreams all her life"

auth_sentence.content: Crucial wins over Liverpool and Norwich were to follow.
auth_sentence.res_content: Crucial wins over Liverpool and Norwich were to follow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Crucial wins over Liverpool and Norwich were to follow.

auth_sentence.content: Do you want to follow one of her recipes?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do you want to follow one of her recipes?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do you want to follow one of her recipes?

auth_sentence.content: Follow-ups were planned, largely recorded and then abandoned.
auth_sentence.res_content: Follow-ups were planned, largely recorded and then abandoned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Follow-ups were planned, largely recorded and then abandoned.

Sentence.sentence: Swedish economists Magnus Henrekson and Mikael Stenkula addressed the following question in their 2009study:why are there so few female top executives in the European egalitarian(平等主义的)welfare states?
Look for New York in the left-hand column and follow it across until you find the hour listed in the Boston column.
The eggs of that following generation may be found in Kentucky, the eggs of next generation may be in the Kang Michigan.

sentences.en: You go first, and I'll follow.
sentences.cn: 你先去, 我随后就来。
接着是一场热烈的讨论。

sentences.en: We shall follow closely the development of the situation.
sentences.cn: 我们将密切注意形势的发展。

sentences.en: He follows the trade of baker.

means.word_mean: 遵照, 接受, 听从

sentences.en: These orders must be followed at once.
sentences.cn: 这些命令必须立即照办。

sentences.en: The detective followed the suspect for three days.
sentences.cn: 侦探跟踪嫌疑犯三天了。

means.word_mean: 沿着…走，顺…走，沿…而行，循(路)

sentences.en: Follow this road to the corner.

means.word_mean: (按时间、顺序等)接着，随后(或跟着、接着)发生，继…之后

sentences.en: A burst of hand-clapping followed the end of the song.
sentences.cn: 歌声结束后是一阵热烈的掌声。

sentences.en: He will follow his father as manager of the business.
sentences.cn: 他将继承他父亲成为这个公司的经理。

means.word_mean: 作为…的结果而发生，是…必然结果，为…的结果，因…而起

sentences.cn: 疾病的发生常是营养不良的结果。

means.word_mean: 接受…的领导(或指导)；承认…的权威；拥护…的思想(或观点、意见等)；信奉

sentences.en: I'm unable to follow your views.
French politics are too complicated for me to follow.
sentences.cn: 法国政治太错综复杂，我弄不清。

jushi.english: In the years that followed,Marx kept on studying English and using it.
jushi.chinese: 在那随后的几年里,马克思坚持学习英语和使用英语。

jushi.english: Inevitably, a quarrel followed between the two sides.
jushi.chinese: 双方随后不可避免地争吵起来。
幸好随后下了一场及时雨。
